step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold! You maintained the position effectively.
Smooth return to the starting position. Well done on completing the first repetition.
Second rep starting strong! Hands clasped in your lap, ready to go.
Great job bringing your hands up. Focus on keeping those elbows in close as you move towards your forehead.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep that head tall and avoid any forward pull.
You held the position well. Keep up the good control.
You completed the exercise smoothly. Great job on both repetitions!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintaining an upright head throughout will help you get the most benefit.
